children.text: x1 Multiplier, being the default to activate when above 15
60% of 25 is 15, which triggers x2 in Peggle
40% of 25 is 10, which triggers x3 in Peggle
24% of 25 is 6, which triggers x5 in Peggle
12% of 25 is 3, which triggers x10 in Peggle

Turns can end via:
- Ball falling out of screen
- Ball falling into bucket
- Ball hitting Evil Peg

- If no pegs are hit and the ball doesn't land in bucket, Coin Flip activates

Upon turn ending, the following must be happen:
- All active pegs need to clear
- Score needs to be totaled
- Purple and Evil Peg need to go back to blue and choose a new blue peg to change
- Turn needs to update
- Ball can only be shootable after all this is done
No Bonus Pegs Activated
Purple Peg Activated
Evil Peg Activated
Both Bonus Pegs Activated
Fixed the bug via setting this to Greater to Or Equal. May be temporary fix
Only activates once every other process has been completed (Coin Flip, All Pegs Deleted). Pretty much global variable reset
